title: 本校體育園區夜間時段開放部份球場供教職員及學生免費使用。Some of the courts in the Sports Complex are open for free use by staff and students during nighttime hours.
author: 邱健榮
content:
分類： 行政公告, 其他公告
來源： 體育中心 - 邱健榮 - janus@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6613
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生_兼任教師
標題： 本校體育園區夜間時段開放部份球場供教職員及學生免費使用。Some of the courts in the Sports Complex are open for free use by staff and students during nighttime hours.
日期： Mon, 22 Apr 2024 12:03:14 +0800
附檔： 籃排球場.png (2 MB)   網球場.png (3 MB)   
因應本校受0403地震影響，校長關心教職員生之身心健康，並指示適度增加同仁及學生的運動時間以紓解壓力及焦慮；故自5/6起至6/17止，開放夜間場地供本校教職員生免費使用。
開放日期：5月6日起至6月17日止
開放時間：每週一~五晚上7點至9點
開放球場：(附開放指定球場圖)
1．向晴籃球場2面
2．向晴排球場4面
3．體育館硬地網球場4面
備註：下雨天不開燈

In response to the impact of the 0403 earthquake on our school, the principal is concerned about the physical and mental health of staff and students, and has instructed to appropriately increase the amount of time for staff and students to exercise to relieve stress and anxiety; therefore, starting from 5/6 to 6/17, the evening venue will be open for free use by our staff and students.
Opening date: May 6th to June 17th.
Opening time: Every Monday~Friday from 7:00pm to 9:00pm
Open Field：(Attached the map of the open designated field)
1. 2 sides of Dormitory IV Basketball Court
2. 4 sides of Dormitory IV Volleyball Court
3. 4 sides of hard surface tennis court in the gymnasium
Remarks: Lights will not be turned on when it rains
